item.description:
We are a few things we should take care of the day before our Open House. Please meet me the day before on May 21st at 1pm to complete these things. We only have 2 hours before the public is let in on the day of the event, so it would be better to complete as much as we can the day before.

Here is a list of some of the items we need to accomplish.

  • Setup fence around display area
  • Double check we have all the supplies we need
  • Bring over our picnic tables
  • Drop off any materials that will be needed
  • Assignment people to helpout in the different areas
  • Make sure all area coordinators have what they need
    • Jim B. - Outside Display Area
    • Louise A. - Ground School Area
    • Deb C. - Young Eagles
    • Dawn M. - Hangar Display Area
    • Charley V. - Announcements and Event Info Booth
    • Steve B. - Food Area

Please let me know if any of our area coordinators can't come to setup day.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in front of Building #13 (aka Louise's hangar)

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Learn To Fly Day Open House - Setup Day
